required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Probiotics as Adjuvant Treatment for Bacterial Vaginosis
clinical_study.official_title: Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Peking University Shenzhen Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators are trying to determine if oral probiotics (Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) (30 days)with metronidazole vaginal suppositories(7 days) is better than using metronidazole vaginal suppositories only in preventing the recurrence of bacterial vaginosis (BV).

detailed_description.textblock: Studies have shown that oral probiotics can significantly promote the recovery of vaginal flora mainly because intestinal microbiota can migrate and affect vaginal microecology. This project aims to evaluate the efficacy of oral probiotics (Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) (30 days) with metronidazole vaginal suppositories(7 days) in the treatment of bacterial vaginosis and to explore the correlation between vaginal flora and fecal flora by detecting the metagenomics of vaginal secretions and intestinal feces at the time of baseline phase, the first month after treatment, the third month after treatment and the sixth month after treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Related Clinical Signs or Symptoms at Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Clinical signs and symptoms of bacteria vaginosis (BV), including homogeneous and thin vaginal discharge, unpleasant odour (such as a "fishy" smell) and vulvar discomfort (such as itching or burning), were recorded at baseline, the number of participants with related clinical signs or symptoms at Baseline were calculated.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Effective in Each Study Arm in the 30-day Follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Clinical signs and symptoms of BV, including homogeneous and thin vaginal discharge, unpleasant odour (such as a "fishy" smell) and vulvar discomfort (such as itching or burning), were recorded at the 30-day, the number of participants with clinically effective (with the sign or symptoms disappeared or released compared with the baseline data) were calculated.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Effective in Each Study Arm at the 90-day Follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Clinical signs and symptoms of BV, including homogeneous and thin vaginal discharge, unpleasant odour (such as a "fishy" smell) and vulvar discomfort (such as itching or burning), were recorded at the 30-day, the number of participants with clinically effective (with the sign or symptoms disappeared or released compared with the 30-day follow-up data) were calculated.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Bacteriological Cure in Each Study Arm at the 30-day Follow-up
primary_outcome.description: A vaginal swab for bacteriological assessment of BV by Nugent criteria was performed. The Nugent score can range from 0 to 10. Bacteriological cure of BV was defined as a normal Nugent score of 0-6. Participants who were clinical failures, or had a Nugent score ≥ 7 were therapeutic failures.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Bacteriological Cure in Each Study Arm at the 90-day Follow-up
primary_outcome.description: A vaginal swab for bacteriological assessment of BV by Nugent criteria was performed. The Nugent score can range from 0 to 10. Bacteriological cure of BV was defined as a normal Nugent score of 0-6. Participants who were clinical failures, or had a Nugent score ≥ 7 were therapeutic failures.

arm_group.description: Probiotics: Oral probiotics(Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) ) (qd, 30 days); Metronidazole: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories (qd,7 days)

intervention.description: Oral probiotics (Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) (qd, 30 days)+Metronidazole Suppositories (qd, 7 days)
intervention.other_name: Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 & Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14 and Metronidazole Suppositories

overall_official.affiliation: Dept of Obstetrics and Gynecology,Peking University Shenzhen Hospital

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Women who came to the gynaecological clinic of Peking University Shenzhen Hospital, China, between March 2019 and June 2019 with abnormal vaginal discharge symptoms were recruited.

group.title: Probiotics and Metronidazole
group.description: Probiotics: Oral probiotics(Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) ) (qd, 30 days); Metronidazole: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories (qd,7 days) "Probiotics" and "Metronidazole": Oral probiotics (Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) (qd, 30 days)+Metronidazole Suppositories (qd, 7 days)

group.title: Metronidazole Vaginal
group.description: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories(1 suppositories,qd,7 days ) Metronidazole Vaginal: Metronidazole Suppositories,qd, 7 days

drop_withdraw_reason.title: Complain of the research staff and refused to continue the trial

group.title: Probiotics and Metronidazole
group.description: Probiotics: Oral probiotics(Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) ) (qd, 30 days); Metronidazole: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories (qd,7 days) "Probiotics" and "Metronidazole": Oral probiotics (Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) (qd, 30 days)+Metronidazole Suppositories (qd, 7 days)

group.title: Metronidazole Vaginal
group.description: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories(1 suppositories,qd,7 days ) Metronidazole Vaginal: Metronidazole Suppositories,qd, 7 days

category.title: Sexual activity (vaginal sex) ≥ 3 times per one month
Had no sexual activity in the last half of the year or vaginal sex less than 3 times per one month

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Related Clinical Signs or Symptoms at Baseline
outcome.description: Clinical signs and symptoms of bacteria vaginosis (BV), including homogeneous and thin vaginal discharge, unpleasant odour (such as a "fishy" smell) and vulvar discomfort (such as itching or burning), were recorded at baseline, the number of participants with related clinical signs or symptoms at Baseline were calculated.
outcome.population: Full analysis set of all randomized participants, that is 126, who had baseline samples were tested.

group.title: Probiotics and Metronidazole
group.description: Probiotics: Oral probiotics(Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) ) (qd, 30 days); Metronidazole: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories (qd,7 days) "Probiotics" and "Metronidazole": Oral probiotics (Umeta-Miyue, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14) (qd, 30 days)+Metronidazole Suppositories (qd, 7 days)

group.title: Metronidazole Vaginal
group.description: Metronidazole vaginal suppositories(1 suppositories,qd,7 days ) Metronidazole Vaginal: Metronidazole Suppositories,qd, 7 days

measure.title: Number of Participants With Related Clinical Signs or Symptoms at Baseline
measure.description: Clinical signs and symptoms of bacteria vaginosis (BV), including homogeneous and thin vaginal discharge, unpleasant odour (such as a "fishy" smell) and vulvar discomfort (such as itching or burning), were recorded at baseline, the number of participants with related clinical signs or symptoms at Baseline were calculated.
measure.population: Full analysis set of all randomized participants, that is 126, who had baseline samples were tested.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: The relevant parameters were determined as follows: test level α=0.05, test power 1-β=0.80, Pt=0.90, Pc=0.75, Nt:Nc=1:1, boundary value Δ= -0.0.068 (excellent), and Fisher's exact test. As a result, the sample size of each group was calculated as 50 patients, 100 patients in total. Considering a loss to follow-up rate of 20%, a sample size of 120 patients was finally determined, with 60 patients in each group.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Clinically Effective in Each Study Arm in the 30-day Follow-up
outcome.description: Clinical signs and symptoms of BV, including homogeneous and thin vaginal discharge, unpleasant odour (such as a "fishy" smell) and vulvar discomfort (such as itching or burning), were recorded at the 30-day, the number of participants with clinically effective (with the sign or symptoms disappeared or released compared with the baseline data) were calculated.

reported_events.desc: All-Cause Mortality and Serious Adverse Events were monitored/assessed, but none were observed.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
